title: Patch Notes
content: d. Fixed a bug where the 'Get Help from Auntie Ethel' quest wouldn't close after you started a fight with her. Fixed the 'Rescue the Druid Halsin' quest sometimes not closing after he gives his briefing about Moonrise Towers. The 'Help the Hag Survivors' quest will now close properly if the hag is defeated.
